css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-a20fc80c-u{padding-top:56px;padding-right:50px;padding-bottom:50px;padding-left:50px;border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-2,74,95,193),1);border-style:solid;border-top-width:2px;border-right-width:2px;border-bottom-width:2px;border-left-width:2px;border-top-left-radius:20px;border-top-right-radius:20px;border-bottom-right-radius:20px;border-bottom-left-radius:20px;min-width:initial;height:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,29,48,53),1);flex-direction:column;align-items:normal;align-content:space-between;}body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-a20fc80c-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-2,74,95,193),1);border-top-left-radius:20px;border-top-right-radius:20px;border-bottom-right-radius:20px;border-bottom-left-radius:20px;border-top-width:2px;border-right-width:2px;border-bottom-width:2px;border-left-width:2px;border-top-style:solid;border-right-style:solid;border-bottom-style:solid;border-left-style:solid;top:-2px;bottom:-2px;left:-2px;right:-2px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-a20fc80c-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,57,79,138),1);display:block;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-a20fc80c-u{padding-top:86px;padding-right:78px;padding-bottom:78px;padding-left:78px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-a20fc80c-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-a20fc80c-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-a20fc80c-u{padding-top:30px;padding-right:30px;padding-bottom:30px;padding-left:30px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-a20fc80c-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,57,79,138),0.85);}}
